name: Sneak out!
description:
Note: You can command the hero to go anywhere that's visible from current position.

Guide your hero through a treacherous map, to escape undetected by the beasts that guard it! A strategy stealth game played atop a paper map.

This game was created in 3 days as the entry for Alakajam Feb 2019 game jam.  It's still very much a work in progress

Feedback and comments most welcome!  Thanks for taking time to play our game :)
